title: Are Moira Rose From ‘Schitt’s Creek’ and Kevin’s Mom From ‘Home Alone’ Played by the Same Actress?
subtitle: Catherine O'Hara has had several memorable roles throughout her career.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The actress who played a character named Moira Rose on the show "Schitt's Creek" is the same actress who played Kevin's mom in "Home Alone."
